section.p: A sharp tang is on the air. The sky, thick with iron-coloured clouds, begins to spin slowly like a great inexorable wheel. The heavens are shot though with brimstone flares. The crew stands slack-faced with dismay.
‘It is the fist of Elnir...’ whimpers the bosun. ‘He means to punish us for our sins.’
